channel.title: Corporate Social Responsibility on FinanClub

item.title: CMCSA
item.description: score:-26 Chances: Comcast moves up the date for the Hulu deal with Disney, potentially unlocking new opportunities. Xfinity’s HBCU Fall Tour may contribute to the company’s growth and innovation in the future. Comcast NBCUniversal is named one of the top companies on PEOPLE’s annual ‘100 Companies That Care’ list.
